verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David.) I will give <S%H3034><s%> Thee thanks <S%H3034><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> my heart; <S%H3820><s%> I will sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> to Thee before <S%H5048><s%> the gods. <S%H430><s%>

I will bow <S%H7812><s%> down <S%H7812><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> Thy holy <S%H6944><s%> temple, <S%H1964><s%> And give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Thy name <S%H8034><s%> for Thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and Thy truth; <S%H571><s%> For Thou hast magnified <S%H1431><s%> Thy word <S%H565><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> Thy name. <S%H8034><s%>
On the day <S%H3117><s%> I called <S%H7121><s%> Thou didst answer <S%H6030><s%> me; Thou didst make <S%H7292><s%> me bold <S%H7292><s%> with strength <S%H5797><s%> in my soul. <S%H5315><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> will give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Thee, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> When <S%H3588><s%> they have heard <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H561><s%> of Thy mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
And they will sing <S%H7891><s%> of the ways <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%> For great <S%H1419><s%> is the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

For though <S%H3588><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is exalted, <S%H7311><s%> Yet He regards <S%H7200><s%> the lowly; <S%H8217><s%> But the haughty <S%H1364><s%> He knows <S%H3045><s%> from afar. <S%H4801><s%>

Though <S%H518><s%> I walk <S%H1980><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of trouble, <S%H6869><s%> Thou wilt revive <S%H2421><s%> me; Thou wilt stretch <S%H7971><s%> forth <S%H7971><s%> Thy hand <S%H3027><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the wrath <S%H639><s%> of my enemies, <S%H340><s%> And Thy right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> will save <S%H3467><s%> me.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will accomplish <S%H1584><s%> what <S%H1157><s%> concerns <S%H1157><s%> me; Thy lovingkindness, <S%H2617><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> is everlasting; <S%H5769><s%> Do not forsake <S%H7503><s%> the works <S%H4639><s%> of Thy hands. <S%H3027><s%>
